param.name: system.php.script
param.spec: text description='PHP script to run' display='normal' label='PHP script:' validationMode='not_empty'

param.name: system.php.workingDir.dir
param.spec: text description='Working directory (if empty - current working directory will be used)' display='normal' label='Working directory:' validationMode='any'

param.name: system.php.params
param.spec: text description='Optional PHP parameters' display='normal' label='PHP parameters:' validationMode='any'

parameters.param:
<project name="PHP">
<condition property="php.workingDir" value="${teamcity.build.workingDir}"> <not> <matches pattern=".+" string="${php.workingDir.dir}"/> </not> </condition> <property name="php.workingDir" value="${php.workingDir.dir}" />
<target name="runPhp"> <exec executable="php" dir="${php.workingDir}" failonerror="true"> <arg line="-f "${php.script}" -d display_errors=On ${php.params}"/> </exec> </target>
</project>
